ðŸ“– Summary: The C++ Compile Helper is a Python script designed to simplify the compilation of C/C++ files. It automatically detects available compilers, validates their functionality, and provides a user-friendly interface for compiling code without the complexities of build systems. It is primarily aimed at beginners who need a simple way to compile C++ code.
